NatureDry Delight's

Dehydrated Amla (Indian Gooseberry) Powder

4 Reviews

Our Dehydrated Amla Powder captures the goodness of Indian gooseberries in a convenient and versatile powdered form. Amla, also known as the Indian gooseberry, is renowned for its rich vitamin C content and various potential health benefits. With our Dehydrated Amla Powder, you can easily incorporate the nutritional benefits of amla into your diet. Add it to smoothies, juices, yogurt, or sprinkle it over your cereal to boost your vitamin C intake and potentially support your immune system. Amla is also believed to have antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, making it a valuable addition to your wellness routine. Explore the tangy and slightly sweet flavor of amla in a convenient powdered form with our Dehydrated Amla Powder.
